pages.title: Turtlemancer Set
pages.text: This armor is one of the most resistant armor, enduring the biggest hits won't be a problem. $(br2)If you have equipped the whole set you will get a bonus of $(l)$(thing)6 hearts$() so... consider it, $(playername).

pages.title: Helmet
pages.text: Isn't this the coolest helmet you have ever seen?

pages.title: Chestplate
pages.text: This will probably last a couple of hits at least. Go fight a dragon or something to test it. Come on, don't be a $(thing)chicken$().

pages.title: Leggings
pages.text: Remember to wear some leggings. Maybe not this ones if you don't want to, but definitely wear some leggings.
Whenever you are asking yourself with boots to choose, remember: $(l)$(#fd79a8)f a s h i o n$() comes first.
